page.title: 02Strete:continued..
page.content: {Employment} With an average age of 60 years few villagers now work.Upto the 1960's most worked on local farms or in the village,e.g. butcher,baker.However those now working commute to the local towns. {Features.} Strete had one of the first schools,the "National School" established in 1839 (now the Laughing Monk Restaurant). Church est.1837 {Clubs.} Ballroom dancing classes, Bowling, Over Sixties Club, Conservative Club, Womens' Institute. Village activities include an annual Village Fete & "Village Day"-a sort of village open day for clubs etc.
